YOUR PROFILE IS IMPORTANT TO YOUR SUCCESS

1. PROFILE PHOTO

Put your best photo up. Add a high-resolution photo of 640x640 pixels to appear your sharpest. Presenting a professional photo builds trust and confidence in the credentials displayed in the profile. A vibrant photograph makes your profile stand out.

2. BIOGRAPHY

Include a short biography to introduce yourself to potential clients. A well-written biography highlights your practice and shows off your passion for the law.

3. SOCIAL MEDIA

Connect your profile to your website, blog, and social media accounts. Professional connections are an important part of your profile. Don't just tell people you practice law, show them.

COMPLETE YOUR PROFILE

Our data shows that lawyers who complete their profiles in our directory receive 76 times more client contacts than those with incomplete profiles. We suggest adding a short biography, updating contact information, participate in Ask a Lawyer, and adding your social media profiles, etc.
